events.label: Inbound Event
events.name: inboundEvent
events.description: Event send for the endpoint each time that a POST request to the root path of the web service.

events.label: Pong
events.name: pong
events.description: Callback event for the Ping function

events.label: Route 1 Event
events.name: route1
events.description: It is one of the callback event for routeMessage function

events.label: Route 2 Event
events.name: route2
events.description: It is one of the callback event for routeMessage function

events.label: Route 3 Event
events.name: route3
events.description: It is one of the callback event for routeMessage function

events.label: Route 4 Event
events.name: route4
events.description: It is one of the callback event for routeMessage function

events.label: Request to application
events.name: requestInformation
events.description: Used to show how to request information from the endpoint to the application

functions.label: Ping
functions.name: ping
functions.description: The service returns the sent value for the Pong event

functions.label: Route Message
functions.name: routeMessage
functions.description: The service returns the sent value for one of the multiple callback events

functions.label: Shows the current weather for the city
functions.name: weather
functions.description: Finds and shows the current weather for the requested city. The openweathermap.org API is used to provide this service.

functions.label: Execute Script
functions.name: executeScript
functions.description: Executes the script configured on the endpoint with the given parameters.

functions.label: Error
functions.name: error
functions.description: Always throws an exception after to try to execute a method that throws a generic exception.

functions.label: Recoverable error
functions.name: recoverableError
functions.description: Always throws an exception after to try to execute a method that throws a recoverable exception.

functions.label: Irrecoverable error
functions.name: irrecoverableError
functions.description: Always throws an exception after to try to execute a method that throws an irrecoverable exception.
